name: Spooky Dancer
description:
Some mix of old arcade ideas and silly dance moves.

Lots of work went in to getting the balance right.

There's a little bit of 'finding out' how to play - but the on-screen hints should get you going. Tap to every beat, jump around and 'eat' the ghosts / monster things, and hit the spacebar to eat the apple and send enemies into 'blue panic' mode - sort of like when you eat ghosts in pacman.

It's a 'get the highest score' game.

Cheers

-K Dog
